movies.title: Library Wars
movies.plot: Set in the year 2019 in Japan. In order to crack down on free expression, a new law is passed, which allows for the government to create an armed force to find and destroy objectionable printed material. Meanwhile, to oppose this oppressive crackdown, the Library Force is created. The Library force, including instructor Atsushi Dojo and Iku Kasahara, work to protect the libraries. A fierce battle then ensues between these two groups.
movies.simplePlot: Set in the year 2019 in Japan. In order to crack down on free expression, a new law is passed, which allows for the government to create an armed force to find and destroy objectionable ...

biography.bio: He's a singer of the Jpop group V6 (6 members) since 1995 at the age of 14 years (the year of creation). This group are two subgroups: 20th Century (the seniors of them) and Coming Century (the juniors, and Okada's subgroup). He's the most younger of them. He's too a three martial arts instructor, with license. He play's piano and guitar.
biography.name: Jun'ichi Okada

biography.bio: Nana Eikura was born on February 12, 1988 in Kagoshima, Japan. She is an actress, known for Step Forward (2008), The Floating Castle (2012) and April Bride (2009). She has been married to Kento Kaku since August 2016.
biography.name: Nana Eikura

biography.bio: Chiaki Kuriyama she was born in Tsuchiura, Ibaraki. Kuriyama was a popular model during Japan's child model boom in the mid-1990s. In 1997, she appeared in the photobooks Shinwa-Shojo (Girl of Myth) and Shojokan (Girl's Residence), photographed by Kishin Shinoyama. Shinwa-Shojo became a best-seller but, as it contained some nudity, was discontinued by the publisher in 1999 after the institution of new anti-child pornography laws. She also posed as a model for the child fashion magazines Nicola (1997-2001) and Pichi Lemon (1996-2001).
biography.name: Chiaki Kuriyama

biography.bio: Kei Tanaka was born on July 10, 1984 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Suicide Club (2001), Rentaneko (2012) and Ossans Love (2016). He has been married to Sakura since August 31, 2011. They have one child.
biography.name: Kei Tanaka

biography.bio: Sôta Fukushi was born on May 30, 1993 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Kamen Rider Fourze (2011), Say 'I Love You' (2014) and Tomorrow I Will Date with Yesterday's You (2016).
biography.name: Sôta Fukushi

biography.bio: Kôji Ishizaka was born on July 20, 1941 in Ginza, Tokyo, Japan as Heikichi Muto. He is an actor, known for Wataru seken wa oni bakari (1990), Aibô (2000) and The Inugami Family (1976).
biography.name: Kôji Ishizaka

biography.bio: Kazuyuki Aijima was born on November 30, 1961 in Kumagaya, Saitama, Japan. He is an actor, known for A Symphony of Us (2006), Shomuni (1998) and Sakura: Jiken wo kiku onna (2014).
biography.name: Kazuyuki Aijima

biography.bio: Jun Hashimoto was born on February 25, 1964 in Kobe, Hyogo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Mahou sentai Magirenjâ (2005), Mahou sentai Magirenjâ vs Dekaranger (2006) and Mahou sentai Magirenjâ the Movie: Inferushia no hanayome (2005).
biography.name: Jun Hashimoto

biography.bio: Kiyoshi Kodama was born on January 1, 1934 in Tokyo, Japan as Kiyoshi Kitagawa. He was an actor, known for Steamboy (2004), Senjo ni nagareru uta (1965) and Death on the Mountain (1961). He was married to Machiko Kitagawa. He died on May 16, 2011 in Tokyo.
biography.name: Kiyoshi Kodama

biography.bio: Eiji is an Japanese actor. Born and raised in Tokyo, Japan. As a teenager, he discovered Acting while he was studying fine arts and music. He took a world journey to broaden his horizons upon completion of Acting School in Japan. He was also trained "Acting for Film and Television" at the Vancouver Film School in Canada and "Filmmaking" at the New York Film Academy, Universal Studios in US. He is living in Japan, working in all over the world.
biography.name: Eiji Leon Lee

biography.bio: Tomoya Maeno is an actor and director, known for The Kirishima Thing (2012), Kanagawa University of Fine Arts, Office of Film Research (2013) and Sister Game (2014).
biography.name: Tomoya Maeno

biography.bio: Shûichirô Masuda is an actor, known for Kamikaze: Le dernier assaut (2013), Non Mama Hakusho (2016) and Crows Explode (2014).
biography.name: Shûichirô Masuda

biography.bio: Ozuno Nakamura is an actor, known for Kamikaze: Le dernier assaut (2013), The Handsome Suit (2008) and Library Wars (2013).
biography.name: Ozuno Nakamura

biography.bio: Taiju Nemoto is known for his work on Appleseed Alpha (2014), Danger Dolls (2014) and Welcome to the El Palacio (2011).
biography.name: Taiju Nemoto

biography.bio: Naomi Nishida was born on February 16, 1972 in Hiroshima, Japan. She is an actress, known for Godzilla 2000 (1999), The Happiness of the Katakuris (2001) and Nabbie no koi (1999).
biography.name: Naomi Nishida

camera: Arri Alexa Studio, Panavision Primo, C-, E-Series and Angenieux Optimo Lenses
